ec365fbe-f434-495a-9d22-93f5b721d352.description: The goal is for our teams to be setup for future career opportunities, by building the skills related to AIML technologies and being certified. This understanding would enable us contextualize deeper technology concepts while following the latest technology trends. It will help us differentiate between tech “myth” and fact and it would also empower us by giving a clear understanding on how the tools we use each day contribute to the success of our organization .
ec365fbe-f434-495a-9d22-93f5b721d352.name: 2021 Tech Fluency Challenge

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge an individual must, first complete one of the AI concept courses, and second must get Certified in an AIML / Data Related Technology of one's interest & choosing.

4b4d667a-0338-4b07-b0d6-7feb76cc1610.description: The objective of this challenge is to increase the awareness and create a basic understanding of enterprise technology principles & priorities of S&P Global Ratings in 2020. It will help us differentiate between tech “myth” and fact and it would also empower us by giving a clear understanding on how the tools we use each day contribute to the success of our organization .

0551f278-3897-4ac1-9e4e-6537ae961287.description: This Strongest Link award is presented to Teams who have distinguished themselves as part of the AI/ML Strategic initiative by helping to develop the organization's AI/ML skills, building processes and strategies to evolve and scale the initiative, or creating an innovative solution related to AI/ML.
0551f278-3897-4ac1-9e4e-6537ae961287.name: Strongest Link - AIML Team Excellence

74a3f2c6-2c1f-4b5c-8c29-e58e85e4d6ec.description: The individual has applied AI/ML powered technology to a process or product. The innovation enables reduced manual effort or increases accuracy or derives new insights that were previously manually intensive, difficult or impossible to achieve.
74a3f2c6-2c1f-4b5c-8c29-e58e85e4d6ec.name: 2021 AI/ML Inline Innovation

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge the individual must, provide area of expertise in AIML and knows some concepts and given a task can execute it using AI/ML technologies or tools. They will have gained specific AI/ML certifications. Have been part of a team who had a use case bronze certified and demonstrate how their expertise had hands on development within this field. They should have published at least one article and published a AIML newsletter as part of the overall 2021 AI/ML initiative.

7a0a963d-6a23-40c5-bc5b-534abf4a59e0.description: Strongest Link of the Quarter Leadership award is a Ratings Technology award issued as part of our global employee recognition program. This award will go to leaders in the organization who have made notable contributions and have gone above and beyond to improve their teams, product lines, horizontal organization or Ratings Technology overall. The award will be presented to one person in each region and will be awarded semi-annually.
7a0a963d-6a23-40c5-bc5b-534abf4a59e0.name: Strongest Link - Leadership Award - Q1 -2021

badge_template_activities.title: A leader is someone who exhibits at least three of the following criteria in their role - Reaching across the organization- Managerial excellence - Thought Leadership - Servant Leadership - A champion and supporter of diversity and inclusion - Elevating people - Innovation - Driving Performance - Mentoring and coaching - Defining and Embracing Standards and leading the way forward - Build/Design solutions with substantial enhancements or improvement and with a quality mindset

The individual nominated for the award should demonstrate the nature of positive impact on S&P Global Ratings along with the specific situation and actions taken or behaviors exhibited including specific results or outcomes of this recipient's work

d91a3e57-f583-427f-be38-2c7082038162.description: Strongest Link of the Quarter is a Ratings Technology award issued as part of our global employee recognition program. The Panel of judges is a global committee made up of representatives from across the Technology Teams, including Product Engineering, IT Architecture, Quality Assurance, Data Engineering, IT Operations, Technology Product Management and Program Management Office.
